pr_title: Improve error logging for when atomic or nonatomic move fails.

timeline.message: Improve error logging for when atomic move fails.

timeline.bodyText:
So a couple of things to keep in mind when doing this.


Down below (retryOnException) is designed to retry this loop if a FileSystemException occurs. So we probably don't want to actually use this here.


In intellij you can search for classes and inspect their contents (ctrl-shift-n ?). If we take a look at FileSystemException there a few constructors in there. The single string constructor actually expects a file as the first parameter. (We're probably not going to use FileSystemException here because of earlier point)
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: Thanks for pointing that out! Moved this message down to the if (!success)) condition.
replies.author: mpeddada1

timeline.bodyText: It's quite possible that instead of here, we show this message down at line 104 (if (!success)) as one of the possibilities that a move/copy failed.
timeline.author: loosebazooka

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                          "unable to move: %s to %s; such failures are often caused by interference from antivirus or if the" +
          
          
            
                                  "operation is not supported by the file system",
          
          
            
                          "unable to move: %s to %s; such failures are often caused by interference from antivirus or if the " +
          
          
            
                                  "operation is not supported by the file system (for example, special non-local file system)",
timeline.author: chanseokoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -98,7 +98,8 @@ private static void moveIfDoesNotExist(Path source, Path destination) throws IOE
     if (!success) {
       String message =
           String.format(
-              "unable to move: %s to %s; such failures are often caused by interference from antivirus",
+              "unable to move: %s to %s; such failures are often caused by interference from antivirus or if the" +
+                      "operation is not supported by the file system",

timeline.message: Improve error logging for when atomic move fails.

merge with master
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into add-error-logging

timeline.bodyText: Not sure about the formatting, should for example, -> for example:?
timeline.author: loosebazooka
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -98,7 +98,8 @@ private static void moveIfDoesNotExist(Path source, Path destination) throws IOE
     if (!success) {
       String message =
           String.format(
-              "unable to move: %s to %s; such failures are often caused by interference from antivirus",
+              "unable to move: %s to %s; such failures are often caused by interference from antivirus or if the "
+                  + "operation is not supported by the file system (for example, special non-local file system)",
